name: Overthinker (jstahn)
description:
A small diorama based on outdated game graphics

Controls:

WASD - Move 

Hold right click - look around

Made by Jasmin Stahn in Unity 2021.3.16f1

Music by Marty Braun 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Sebastian Stamm and Nils Camin for the BA of the Winter Semester 2022-2023.
